messages.title: Welcome to E-pragati
messages.formattedText:
Welcome to E-pragati,Towards digital AP........
e-Pragati is a framework that provides integrated services to citizens through free flow of information. It is going to be used to usher in an era of good governance, characterized by efficiency, effectiveness, transparency, and foresight.
